english.segment1: I feel like I keep fallingon my face. In a world where ther's no room for second place.
english.segment2: My confidence is growing. I find strength in knowing. It's okay 'cause Your love is here reaching out to me. I don't want anything but You. (You're so amazing, there's no replacing You). I don't want anything but You. (You're so amazing, ther's no replacing You)
english.segment3: Without You I'm just living to survive. You're the only one who makes me feel alive.
english.segment4: I want the wold to know it. I'm not afraid to show it. Cuse You're all I want.
english.segment5: I wanna love You more 'ause You deserve it. You deserve it. You're so amazing, no replacing You. You're so amazing!
english.segment6: I don't want anything, no, anything but You..
